channel.title: Homes on Pierce Donovan
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pierce Donovan

item.description: About Me I am a Ph.D. candidate in Agricultural and Resource Economics at the University of California, Davis. I have extensive training in environmental and natural resource economics, structural econometrics, and development economics. I am currently developing new techniques to solve dynamic optimization problems with joint probabilistic constraints. I am also motivated to develop convincing methods of non-market valuation for resource problems where a clear benefits function is not evident.
